description: The third Guardian Character, Suu, represents Amu`s desire to be more caring and improve her domestic skills. However, Suu is prone to silly mistakes. She is very fond of Amu`s teacher, Yuu Nikaidou, after helping Nikaidou realise that he was a good person and can still pursue his own dreams. Amu gains an improvement in cooking and sewing skills during Character Change, as well as becoming
name: Suu
